name: Lisa Murkowski
summary: Republican Senator from Alaska who voted to convict Trump in his second impeachment trial and endorsed Nikki Haley in the 2024 Republican primary instead of Trump.

keyStatements.quote: I cannot vote to convict the former president on this article of impeachment... But I did not come to a decision on this. I made a commitment to Alaskans that I would carefully consider the case that was put before me and make a decision based on the facts.
I will not vote for Donald Trump.

timeline.event: Withdrew support for Trump after Access Hollywood tape
Voted to convict Trump in second impeachment
timeline.significance: One of seven Republicans to vote for conviction

timeline.event: Endorsed Nikki Haley in GOP primary

credibility.background: Long-serving U.S. Senator known for independent streak, member of key Senate committees
positions: Member, Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee

oppositionReasons: Trump's role in January 6 attack warranted conviction
Trump's conduct and character are disqualifying
Trump lacks the temperament for the presidency
Trump divides rather than unites the country
endorsement: Endorsed Nikki Haley in 2024 Republican primary; will not vote for Trump

sources.title: Murkowski says she will not vote for Trump
List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
